title: The Energy management program
creator_credit: Mark Poole, John R. Hipwell, Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria and Commonwealth Department of Primary Industries and Energy
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Energy management in commercial buildings”.
This video is part of “The Energy management program” commissioned by the Commonwealth Department of Primary Industries and Energy and the Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria. In this episode interviews are conducted with energy managers who have proven they can reduce costs while at the same time improving building comfort and helping the environment.
creator_credit_for_label: Mark Poole, John R. Hipwell, Gas and Fuel Corporation of Victoria and Commonwealth Department of Primary Industries and Energy
